response.original_title: Mick Jagger - The Very Best of Mick Jagger
response.overview: 2007 Special Edition of Melua's 2005 Studio Album with a Bonus Dvd. The Content of the Dvd (Ntsc/Region 0) is Drawn from the Concert Footage Shot During the European Tour of 2006 and Directed by Mike Sergeant, Combined with Behind-the-scenes and On-the-road Footage Shot by Various Teams Along the Way and also Incorporating Some 'amateur' Footage Shot by the Band And/Or Katie Herself. Mike and the 13 Camera Outside Broadcast Unit Recorded Two Concerts During the Tour, One in Amsterdam and One in Dusseldorf. Although You Will See Some Footage Drawn from Amsterdam, Most of the Concert that You Will See is Taken from the Dusseldorf Performance. On the Back of the Pack You Will See that There Are Three Promo Videos which Come as Extras on the Dvd.
response.title: Mick Jagger - The Very Best of Mick Jagger
